main event: A bright object was observed in the night sky near Aviano Air Base in Italy. It appeared bright at the center, like a light bulb, and remained visible for 12 minutes while appearing to be stationary in the same position during two separate sightings.
interesting points: The object was observed by military personnel and was described as bright against the clear blue sky.
It was visible at a high altitude, approximately 68 to 80 degrees above the cruise altitude of 37,000 feet.
The object did not disappear while being observed and was still visible after 12 minutes.
The sighting was corroborated by multiple pilots, with personnel describing the reliability of the witnesses as excellent.
Despite observation from the Air Force, no separate sighting was reported.
sighted object: bright object in the night sky
location: Vicinity of Aviano Air Base, Italy
witnesses: Military personnel including Captain, 1st Lieutenant, and pilot
photographs: no photographs included in the report
